item.name: The Edge of True Darkness
entries: Forged from a mysterious metal that absorbs light, The Edge of True Darkness was crafted by a forgotten sect of shadow monks. This greatsword feels surprisingly light, and its blade emits a faint, eerie glow during the night.

entries.name: Shadow Strike
entries: When you hit a creature with this weapon during nighttime, you can expend one charge to cast the spell 'Darkness' centered on the target without using a spell slot. The spell ends at the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Daylight Vulnerability
entries: While exposed to direct sunlight, the wielder has disadvantage on attack rolls with this weapon.
